segments.text: Oh , gosh ! I feel everything around me is against me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't take it too hard . There are some tips you should know in job-hunting of 2010 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I am all ears . Maybe they are helpful .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Firstly , you must always show your best to the interviewer . And secondly , try to avoid spamming through e-mails , because this will make the reader go crazy . The last but not the least , there is no substitute for pounding the pavement in such a digital age .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I understand what you mean , and I will not upset myself . Face it .
segments.speaker: S1
